name: Warframe
description: Uses the main MSI installer instead of the offline installer. Also enables the storage of DXVK State Cache in separate, persistent directory.
notes:
On first run, be sure to exit after the updates finish installing. 

Cache folder will install in the same parent directory as the selected Game Directory, named ".warframe-cache"

task.description:
Running Warframe installer. An installer will open.
------------------------------
To progress, manually continue installation in that window. Be sure to close before first launch
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- wfmsi:
    filename: Warframe.msi
    url: http://content.warframe.com/dl/Warframe.msi
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Local Settings/Application Data/Warframe/Downloaded/Public/Tools/Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: 'Running Warframe installer. An installer will open.

      ------------------------------

      To progress, manually continue installation in that window. Be sure to close
      before first launch'
    executable: wfmsi
    name: wineexec
system:
  env:
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/../.warframe-cache/DXVK
    PBA_DISABLE: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/../.warframe-cache/GL_Shader
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
